project_description.description: Experience unparalleled luxury at 'The Twins by DSR', where opulence knows no bounds. Discover India's largest residential apartments, with an impressive 15,999 square feet on every floor, setting a new standard in spacious living.
The Twins by DSR Hyderabad's first residential project with 13 feet floor height, indulge in a sense of grandeur and space unlike any other.
The Twins by DSR Spanning across 3 acres, with 4 basements and 44 floors in each tower, 'The Twins' offers a total of 85 units across 2 towering structures.

Experience the privilege of residing at Twins, where luxury reaches its pinnacle. Our residences are the hallmark of opulence, offering a lifestyle like no other. Step into contemporary interiors meticulously designed to cater to your every need. Indulge in the essence of luxury living at Twins.

Introducing South India's first residential project with a distinctive glass facade. Elevate your living experience with unparalleled sophistication and modern design. Be part of a groundbreaking architectural marvel at Twins.

Embark on a new era of luxury living at Twins, Hyderabad's premier residential project boasting state-of-the-art amenities. Experience convenience like never before with central vacuum and pest control facilities integrated seamlessly into every aspect of your home. Discover the epitome of modern living at Twins.

Indulge in luxury like never before with amenities spanning across a multi-level clubhouse at Twins. Elevate your lifestyle with exclusive facilities designed to cater to your every need. Experience the epitome of opulence at every level.

nearby_projects.name: Poulomi Palazzo
nearby_projects.description: 55 STORIES OF LUXURY-The crux of luxury living is impeccable planning, so your home and surroundings imbibe a smooth flow and easy living. Immaculate planning translates to a seamless home, holds the best influx of light and air, and is the perfect canvas to create a home to your taste.
